~Dash~.Effect: Replenish your Movement this turn and you can move again if you already moved.
~Dash~.Name: ~Dash~

~Defend~.Effect: Until the start of your next turn, your Defense and all Combat Checks increase by +2.
~Defend~.Name: ~Defend~

~Disengage~.Effect: You don't trigger attacks of oportunity this turn.
~Disengage~.Name: ~Disengage~

~Improvised Attack~.Effect:
You can use small, medium or large non-weapon objects from around and attack with them.
Small Objects - Half-Action, 1d6 + Dexterity Smash or Pierce damage, thrown at 3 to 6 meters range
Medium Objects - Half-Action, 1d6 + Might Smash damage, 2 meters range
Large Objects - 1 Action, 2d8 + Might Smash damage, 1 meter range
If you roll maximum on any of those dice and the object can break, it breaks and deals an extra 1d4 damage.
~Improvised Attack~.Notes:
A Small object is considered something you can hold in your hand (e.g. something up to 20cm across, a rock, etc).
A Medium object is considered something you can grab and throw with your hand (e.g. something up to 50cm across, a chair, etc).
A Large object is something you would not be able to throw with only one hand (e.g. a table).
~Improvised Attack~.Name: ~Improvised Attack~

~Push~.Effect: Try to push a Unit 1 meter in any direction (Might or Dexterity Check, its choice).
~Push~.Name: ~Push~

~Shift~.Effect:
You can move 1 meter without triggering attacks of oportunity.
This turn you can't move normally (and you can't use this if you already did).
~Shift~.Name: ~Shift~

~Taunt~.Effect:
Make an enemy roll a Wisdom Check.
If it fails, its next attack gains Cover (-2) if it's not on you.
~Taunt~.Name: ~Taunt~

~Throw Weapon~.Effect: Throw a melee weapon towards a Unit. The attack deals damage as if it were a normal attack, but has a -2 Penalty and does not apply weapon effects.
~Throw Weapon~.Notes:
You can add your Might/Dexterity to the attack, normally, if you are Trained in that weapon (or that weapon's category, of course).
There is a Feat that allows you to throw weapons without penalties.
~Throw Weapon~.Name: ~Throw Weapon~

~Action Surge~.Effect: Gain one more Half-Action this turn only.
~Action Surge~.Name: ~Action Surge~

~Aim~.Effect: After your next attack within 10 minutes, you can reroll all dice and keep the new result.
~Aim~.Notes: Applies to Abilities and buffs added to the attack, like Smite. If you decide to reroll, you have to reroll ALL of them; Smite and similar abilities must be added before the reroll.
~Aim~.Name: ~Aim~

~Bull Rush~.Effect: If you move at least 3 meters in a straight line and then melee attack a target, the attack gains +1.
~Bull Rush~.Name: ~Bull Rush~

~Grapple~.Effect:
You make a Might roll and the target makes a Dexterity or Might roll (its choice).
If you roll equal to or more than the enemy, the enemy becomes Grappled (Snared and Dazed).
~Grapple~.Name: ~Grapple~

~Hamstring~.Effect: A target becomes Slowed for 1 turn.
~Hamstring~.Name: ~Hamstring~

~Hide~.Effect:
When combat starts, if you have Cover from all enemies, you start as Hidden.
While Hidden, you can skip your turn.
Then, you can unhide and start your turn whenever you like (even during enemies' turns).
If you did this, when your turn ends, you are no longer hidden.
~Hide~.Notes:
Attacking or using Abilities or moving out of cover in relation to any enemy makes you unhides you.
If you don't start your turn this round, you essentially lose your turn. You don't take 2 turns next round.
If you want to start during an enemy's turn, you do so when they declare they want to do something or after they finish doing something.
In special circumstances, the DM might ask you to make a Dexterity Check to remain Hidden.
You can't become Hidden through non-Ability means.
~Hide~.Name: ~Hide~

~Lightstrike~.Effect:
Make a melee attack that deals 1d8 + 2 Force damage.
After the attack, your turn ends immediately.
~Lightstrike~.Notes: This counts as a weapon attack (1-Handed or 2-Handed, depending on your weapon).
~Lightstrike~.Name: ~Lightstrike~

~Slam~.Effect:
All units within 2 meters of you take 2d4 Smash damage.
One of them of your choice takes an extra 1d4 Smash damage.
~Slam~.Notes: Can be used with Shields equipped.
~Slam~.Name: ~Slam~

~Wait~.Effect:
Skip your turn and declare any number as your new initiative.
You start your turn later this Encounter at that initiative.
~Wait~.Notes: Your new initiative stays like that for later turns.
~Wait~.Name: ~Wait~

~Chilling Shout~.Effect:
Attack a sentient Unit for 12 + Main Stat Cold damage (against Defense).
It becomes Slowed.
~Chilling Shout~.Notes:
Doesn't work on Units that can't feel fear.
Can be used with Shields equipped.
~Chilling Shout~.Name: ~Chilling Shout~

~Muscle Tear~.Effect:
A Unit must pass a Might Check or be affected by Muscle Tearing. While affected, whenever the Unit makes a physical attack or uses a physical damaging Ability, the damage can't be more than (Your Level) + (Your Main Stat).
It must try to pass the Check at the end its every turn to remove the Muscle Tearing.
Only works on Units that have muscles.
~Muscle Tear~.Notes:
E.g. if you are Level 3 and your Main Stat is 2, that limits the damage to 5.
Damage limit is applied before Defense for attacks; subtract Defense after limiting the damage.
~Muscle Tear~.Name: ~Muscle Tear~

~Panic Lash~.Effect: A target within 3 meters takes 3d4 Psychic damage (directly) and can't cast Healing spells or regain Health for 1 turn.
~Panic Lash~.Name: ~Panic Lash~

~Recuperate~.Effect: Heal yourself for 1d6 and remove all Snare and Slow effects on you.
~Recuperate~.Upgrade:
At Level 4, the healing increases to 1d8.
At Level 6 this also removes Cripples.
~Recuperate~.Name: ~Recuperate~

~Shank~.Effect: Make a melee attack with a 1-Handed Weapon. It has Cover (-2).
~Shank~.Name: ~Shank~

~Vault Break~.Effect: Attack and break an obstacle near you that takessquare meters equal to your Level area and is made of wood, rubble, shrubbery, dirt, ice, magic barrier or any similar material. After casting this Ability, if you moved this turn, you can continue your movement.
~Vault Break~.Notes: If you are Level 4, that's 4 square meters; meaning either 4x1 meters or 2x2 meters. The height of the obstacle can be up to 3 meters tall, but it's up to the GM's whether you can break certain tall objects.
~Vault Break~.Name: ~Vault Break~

~Blood Foment~.Effect: A target must pass a Charisma Check or take 4d6 Fire damage (or half if it succeeds) and be limited to only one attack per turn; it must make the Check again at the end of its every turn and this limit persists until it passes the Check.
~Blood Foment~.Note: The damage happens only once, when you use this Ability.
~Blood Foment~.Name: ~Blood Foment~

~Aim~.Effect: After your next attack within 10 minutes, you can reroll all dice and keep the new result.
~Aim~.Notes: Applies to Abilities and buffs added to the attack, like Smite. If you decide to reroll, you have to reroll ALL of them; Smite and similar abilities must be added before the reroll.
~Aim~.Name: ~Aim~

~Bull Rush~.Effect: If you move at least 3 meters in a straight line and then melee attack a target, the attack gains +1.
~Bull Rush~.Name: ~Bull Rush~

~Grapple~.Effect:
You make a Might roll and the target makes a Dexterity or Might roll (its choice).
If you roll equal to or more than the enemy, the enemy becomes Grappled (Snared and Dazed).
~Grapple~.Name: ~Grapple~

~Hamstring~.Effect: A target becomes Slowed for 1 turn.
~Hamstring~.Name: ~Hamstring~

~Hide~.Effect:
When combat starts, if you have Cover, you start as Hidden.
While Hidden, you can skip your turn.
Then, you can unhide and start your turn whenever you like (even during enemies' turns).
If you did this, when your turn ends, you are no longer hidden.
~Hide~.Notes:
Essentially, you can interrupt another Unit's turn, put that unit on pause, and start your turn. When your turn ends, the Unit resumes its turn.
If you want to start during an enemy's turn, you do so when they declare they want to do something or after they finish doing something.
~Hide~.Name: ~Hide~

~Lightstrike~.Effect:
Make a melee attack that deals 1d8 + 2 Force damage.
After the attack, your turn ends immediately.
~Lightstrike~.Name: ~Lightstrike~

~Wait~.Effect:
Skip your turn and declare any number as your new initiative.
You start your turn later this Encounter at that initiative.
~Wait~.Notes: Your new initiative stays like that for later turns.
~Wait~.Name: ~Wait~

~Atonement~.Effect:
Lose (5 + Main Stat) Health.
Gain (7 + Your Level) as much Shielding for 1 hour.
~Atonement~.Name: ~Atonement~

~Stand Stoic~.Effect:
All Prone allies (and you) immediately stand up. All allies (and you) remove their Snares and Slows.
None of you can suffer from Fleeing until the start of your next turn.
You (yourself) can continue your movement if you already moved.
~Stand Stoic~.Notes: Fleeing is when you move away from an enemy's melee attack range; if you are Fleeing, all your actions have Cover.
~Stand Stoic~.Name: ~Stand Stoic~

~Assess Their Ranks~.Effect: Gain Shielding equal to the number of Worthy Enemies you see.
~Assess Their Ranks~.Name: ~Assess Their Ranks~

~Battle Trust~.Effect: Another ally you can see gains 50% Resistance to a named physical damage type (Slash, Smash, Pierce or Force).
~Battle Trust~.Notes: You can't use this on yourself
~Battle Trust~.Name: ~Battle Trust~

~Glory Shout~.Effect: You and all allies that can hear you are healed for 3 Health.
~Glory Shout~.Name: ~Glory Shout~

~Infailible Reach~.Effect:
Use any melee weapon to perform a heavy blow on a Unit within 3 meters.
It must pass a Dexterity Check or take 3d10 + (Your Main Stat) damage of that weapon's type.
If it passes, it takes half of that damage.
~Infailible Reach~.Notes:
Extra damage from magic weapons does apply to this damage.
Can be used with Shields equipped.
~Infailible Reach~.Name: ~Infailible Reach~

~Row Through~.Effect:
Push a Unit up to 6 meters away from you.
If it collides with something, it must pass a Might Check or be Stunned and take 1d4 Smash damage (and it stops).
If it collides with another Unit, that Unit is also pushed in the same direction and continues a chain of Row Through.
~Row Through~.Notes:
E.g. if it collides with a Unit, that Unit is also pushed up to 6 meters and if it collides with something, it must pass a Might Check or be Stunned and take the damage. If that thing it collided with was a Unit, that Unit is also pushed up to 6 meters and must pass the Might Check and so on.
Can be used with Shields equipped.
~Row Through~.Name: ~Row Through~

~Whirlwind~.Effect:
Roll 2d10 for each Unit within 3 meters of you.
Assign 2 of the rolled d10's to each of those Units, and deal that much damage as Slash damage to it (directly).
~Whirlwind~.Name: ~Whirlwind~

~Acid Burst~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Dexterity Check.
It takes 1d4 + Main Stat Acid damage (directly) on a failed Check, or half of that if it succeeds.
~Acid Burst~.Name: ~Acid Burst~

~Burning Breath~.Effect:
All Units in a 90 degree, 3 meter cone take 3 Fire damage (directly).
Units can't benefit from Cover from this Ability.
~Burning Breath~.Upgrade: At Level 4, the damage increases to 4 damage.
~Burning Breath~.Name: ~Burning Breath~

~Bonfire~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter zone.
A bonfire errupts in that place.
Any Unit touching the bonfire takes 1d8 Fire damage (directly).
~Bonfire~.Notes:
If the bonfire can spread fire to nearby flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, it spreads at the start of your next turn (same for further bonfires).
If the bonfire touches the same unit multiple times on the same turn, it only deals the damage once.
~Bonfire~.Name: ~Bonfire~

~Control Flames~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of fire.
Choose one of the following things to do with it:
- You can spread the fire up to (Your Level) meters in any direction (Your Level spaces of 1x1 meter)
- You can extinguish it
- You can double of halve the radius of light or heat it spreads
- You can change its color
- You can cause simple shapes to appear in the flicker.
You can have 2 effects active at the same time at level 1, 4 at level 4 and unlimited at level 8.
Effects last up to 1 hour.
If the fire touches a Unit, it takes 1d8 Fire damage (directly).
~Control Flames~.Notes: If you spread the fire, you can spread it in any shape - arrange the fire squares how you like.
~Control Flames~.Name: ~Control Flames~

~Control Water~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube, with or without water.
Choose one of the following things to do with it:
- You can move the water in it (Your Level) meters in any direction
- You can roughly alter the water's shape
- You can change its water's color or opacity
- You can alter its water's temperature, making it anywhere between near-freezing or near-boiling
- You can fill it water or destroy all water in it
Shape, color and temperature effects last for up to 1 hour.
The area increases to 2x2x2 meters at Level 4 and 4x4x4 meters at Level 8.
~Control Water~.Upgrade: You can use this a number of times per Long Rest equal to your Level.
~Control Water~.Notes: This Ability cannot do Damage or Crowd Control, but can act as difficult terrain for Units passing through it.
~Control Water~.Name: ~Control Water~

~Control Earth~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of dirt, loose stone, sand, etc.
You can do the following things to it.
This turn, and every turn for 10 minutes, you can spend 1 Action to:
- Move it 1 meter in any direction
- Roughly shape it in any form
- Cause it to become difficult terrain.
If a Unit was hit by it or it was removed from below a Unit's feet, it rolls a Dexterity Check (against your Counter Check Grade).
If it fails, it takes 1d8 damage and is knocked prone (or 2d8 damage if the earth was removed from underneath its feet).
The earth can hold up to 20kg of mass on it.
~Control Earth~.Upgrade: You can do this twice per Long Rest at Level 2, 4 times per Long Rest at Level 4 and unlimited times at level 8.
~Control Earth~.Notes:
The cube has 10 Health, 0 Defense and fails all checks for combat purposes. It's immune to Psychic damage and crowd control.
Units might or might not gain Cover from the damage, depending on the circumstance (Cover from the direction the earth is coming from, of course).
~Control Earth~.Name: ~Control Earth~

~Flame Bolt~.Effect: Make a Spell attack that deals deal 2d8 + Main Stat Fire damage (against Defense).
~Flame Bolt~.Name: ~Flame Bolt~

~Flameblade~.Effect: You can freely change the damage of your melee weapon attacks to Fire damage.
~Flameblade~.Name: ~Flameblade~

~Frostbite~.Effect:
Send out a wave of frost towards a Unit.
It must pass a Might Check or take (directly) 2d8 + 2 Cold Damage, or half if it succeeds.
If it fails, it is also Slowed.
~Frostbite~.Name: ~Frostbite~

~Land Breach~.Effect:
You gather stone, dirt, sand, etc from the surroundings and release it upon an enemy.
Attack a Unit for 3d6 damage Force damage, and then attack all other Units within 1 meter for Damage equal to two of rolled dice (you choose).
~Land Breach~.Notes: All attacks are against Defense. The secondary attack is considered a single separate attack (good to know for certain other Abilities).
~Land Breach~.Name: ~Land Breach~

~Quicksand~.Effect:
Declare a 2x2 meter zone made of dirt, sand or other such material.
That zone becomes Difficult Terrain.
~Quicksand~.Variant: You can also cause this difficult terrain with vegetation.
~Quicksand~.Name: ~Quicksand~

~Thunder Clap~.Effect:
Choose either 1 meter range or 2 meters range.
Attack all Units within the chosen range for 2d8 Shock damage (against their Defense).
~Thunder Clap~.Notes: Ignores Cover and goes through obstacles and walls. You choose if you want to cast this at 1 meter or 2 meters radius.
~Thunder Clap~.Name: ~Thunder Clap~

~Absorb Element~.Effect:
Use when you take magic damage.
You only take half of that damage, and you infuse yourself with that element.
The next time you make a single target attack, that attack deals 1d6 extra damage of the infused element.
~Absorb Element~.Name: ~Absorb Element~

~Crackling Lightning~.Duration: Until the target dies or you don't do this
~Crackling Lightning~.Effect:
When you cast this the first time, declare a target.
Every turn (including this), you can use Half-Action to attack that target for 3d6 Shock damage (against Defense).
If you don't do this on a turn, the spell ends.
~Crackling Lightning~.Notes: You only pay the 1 Mana cost when you activate this Spell, not on every turn's Half-Action that you spend.
~Crackling Lightning~.Name: ~Crackling Lightning~

~Frost Nova~.Effect:
All Units within 2 meters of you make a Dexterity Check.
They take 1d8 + 4 Cold Damage (directly) if they fail, or half of that if they succeed.
If they fail, they are also Slowed.
~Frost Nova~.Name: ~Frost Nova~

~Frost Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on a smooth solid surface. The rune covers a 1x1 area.
Heavy physical contact with the rune detonates it, dealing 4d6 Cold Damage (against Defense) to the Unit that activates it.
Also, it must pass a Dexterity Check or be Snared.
~Frost Rune~.Notes: This is not considered an attack.
~Frost Rune~.Name: ~Frost Rune~

~Explosion Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on a smooth solid surface. The rune covers a 1x1 area.
You can use a free Reaction to detonate it, dealing 4d6 half Fire half Force damage (against Defense) to the Unit that activates it and all Units within 2 meters of it.
~Explosion Rune~.Upgrade: At Level 4, this lasts until your next Long Rest.
~Explosion Rune~.Notes: A free Reaction does not use up your Reaction.
~Explosion Rune~.Name: ~Explosion Rune~

~Ice Spike~.Effect:
The target rolls a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, it takes 3d8 + 2 Cold damage (directly), or half otherwise.
The target automatically fails if it's affected by any Crowd Control (except Hard Terrain).
~Ice Spike~.Name: ~Ice Spike~

~Fire Enchantment~.Effect:
Touch a weapon to imbue it with Fire.
That weapon deals +2 Fire damage (as part of the attack).
Lasts until the end of the next (or current) combat, or for up to 24 hours.
~Fire Enchantment~.Notes: Does not stack with other weapon enchantments from Spells.
~Fire Enchantment~.Name: ~Fire Enchantment~

~Heat Metal~.Effect:
Choose a piece of metal and heat it.
- If it's an armor, the wearer takes 2d6 + 1 Fire damage (directly).
- If it's a weapon, the wearer takes Main Stat Damage (directly) and Also, it must pass a Might Check or be Crippled.
~Heat Metal~.Name: ~Heat Metal~

~Flame Strike~.Effect:
Conjure a 5x5 zone of flames on the ground.
At the end of each of your turns, roll 1d4 + 2.
All Units inside the zone take that amount as Fire damage (directly).
~Flame Strike~.Name: ~Flame Strike~

~Scorching Rays~.Effect: Make 3 attacks. Each does 1d6 + 4 Fire damage (each vs Defense).
~Scorching Rays~.Name: ~Scorching Rays~

~Freeze Water~.Effect:
Choose a point you can see with a continuous mass of water. You begin channeling.
On every turn (until you stop channeling), the water freezes in a sphere around the point, (Your Level - 3) meters radius for each Half-Action spent.
~Freeze Water~.Name: ~Freeze Water~

~Fire Ball~.Effect: Attack all Units in a 6x6x6 cube for 6d6 Fire damage (against Defense).
~Fire Ball~.Name: ~Fire Ball~

~Water Sphere~.Effect:
Shoot a 1 meter in diameter ball of water in a direction parallel to the floor that can travel up to 9 meters.
The ball can bounce off of walls and solid objects (not Units).
The angle it bounces to is equal to the angle it was thrown from respective to the surface it bounces from (like light is reflected in a mirror in real life).
The ball bursts when it collides with a Unit, dealing 2d10 + 2 damage plus 1d10 for each time it bounced (against Defense).
The Sphere can bounce up to 2 times.
~Water Sphere~.Notes: This is considered an attack. All attacks are against Defense.
~Water Sphere~.Name: ~Water Sphere~

~Dancing Blade~.Effect: Your melee weapon attacks have 2 meters range, by levitating to your target, hitting them, then quickly returning to your hand.
~Dancing Blade~.Name: ~Dancing Blade~

~Magic Missiles~.Effect: Shoot a number of missiles equal to your Main Stat. Each missile does 1d4 Force damage (directly).
~Magic Missiles~.Upgrade: At Level 4, you can also spend any amount of Mana, and you shoot 2 more missiles for each Mana spent.
~Magic Missiles~.Notes:
You can send missiles to different targets, but you must declare all the attacks at once.
Each missile can be affected individually by Cover (e.g. shooting all 3 missiles at a Unit that has Cover makes each missile deal 1d4 - 2 damage).
~Magic Missiles~.Name: ~Magic Missiles~

~Prestidigitation~.Effect:
You can create harmless sensory effects.
You can create sparks and change the temperature of objects (channeled).
You can instantly clean or soil objects.
You can make symbols appear on surfaces (up to 1 hour).
You can create small, harmless illusions that fit into your hand.
You can control a quill with telekinesis to quickly write with it (1 meter range).
~Prestidigitation~.Name: ~Prestidigitation~

~Resistance~.Effect:
Touch an ally (or yourself) and choose one Stat.
It has +1d4 in all Combat Checks with that Stat.
You can only have this buff active on one person at a time.
~Resistance~.Name: ~Resistance~

~Focus Fling~.Effect:
Choose a medium-sized object within 5 meters that's no heaveier than 20kg.
Fling the object into a Unit within 3 meters of the object.
It must pass a Dexterity Check or take 1d10 Smash damage. It takes half of the damage if it passes.
~Focus Fling~.Upgrade: At Level 4, you can spend 1 Mana to increase the damage to 2d12.
~Focus Fling~.Notes:
Cover is applied from the object's initial position to the target.
If the object can break, it breaks. Obviously, the object must be move-able and not tied/stuck in place.
~Focus Fling~.Name: ~Focus Fling~

~Arcane Spear~.Effect:
All Units in a 6 meter line from you make a Dexterity Check.
Deal 13 damage (directly) to all targets who failed.
If no Unit failed, you gain the Mana back.
~Arcane Spear~.Name: ~Arcane Spear~

~Flash~.Effect: Instantly teleport up to 6 meters away.
~Flash~.Notes: You take with you all items carried.
~Flash~.Name: ~Flash~

~Mage Armor~.Effect: Your total Defense (with all calculations) can't be lower than 3.
~Mage Armor~.Name: ~Mage Armor~

~Magic Nova~.Effect:
Declare a 2x2 meter area.
All Units in that are must pass a Might Check or take 7d4 Force Damage (directly), or half of that if they pass.
The blast extends 2 more meters from its edges in all directions and further damages directly all Units on this 2-meter edge for half of the damage rolled.
~Magic Nova~.Notes: To conclude, the total area of this Spell is 4x4 meters. The Units in the 2x2 center must pass the check or take full damage and the units on the edge just take half of the damage (as if they passed a Check for the center).
~Magic Nova~.Name: ~Magic Nova~

~Phase Orb~.Effect:
Pick a 1x1 zone. A magical orb is created in that place.
At the start of your next turn, the orb dashes to your position.
All Units in the orb's path take 3d4 Force damage (directly).
~Phase Orb~.Name: ~Phase Orb~

~Spell Seal~.Effect:
Choose a Unit you can see.
Whenever it casts a Spell that heals or deals damage, roll 1d4 and subtract it from the roll.
Lasts for 1 minute.
~Spell Seal~.Upgrade:
At Level 4, you can spend 1 more Mana to increase the roll to 2d4.
At Level 7, you can spend 2 more Mana instead to increase the roll to 3d4.
~Spell Seal~.Name: ~Spell Seal~

~Shield Element~.Effect:
Name 1 element from Fire/Cold/Electric and choose two allies.
The next time those allies would take that type of damage, that damage is halved.
~Shield Element~.Name: ~Shield Element~

~Antimagic Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on the ground.
You can activate it at any time and from any distance.
When you activate it, the rune creates a 5x5 meter zone.
Try to Silence all units inside (Intelligence Check) and they also take (Your Level) Force damage on detonation.
~Antimagic Rune~.Name: ~Antimagic Rune~

~Dispel Magic~.Effect: Touch an ally (or yourself) and dispell any ongoing or negative short-term magical effects on it. At Level 6, you can remove long-term magical effects with this as well.
~Dispel Magic~.Name: ~Dispel Magic~

~Feather Fall~.Effect:
Consume a 10 gold worth for an <Arcane Feather>.
Up to 2 Units you choose will start falling gently, down to 3 meters per round.
Once the fall finishes, the spell effect ends.
~Feather Fall~.Notes:
Arcane Feathers can be bought in most towns.
For faster gameplay, you can spend 10 gold when casting the spell, and buy the feather later.
~Feather Fall~.Name: ~Feather Fall~

~Invisibility~.Effect:
You become invisible for up to (Intelligence) minutes (at least 1).
Attacking, taking damage or casting offensive spells while invisible breaks the invisibility.
~Invisibility~.Name: ~Invisibility~

~Levitate~.Effect:
First, roll 2d100. That's how many kilograms you can levitate when you cast this.
You can levitate one object you can see that remains within 10 meters of you.
You can slowly move the object vertically, 1 meter for each 2 of your movement points spent to levitate.
If you use this on an enemy, it must fail a Might Check to be levitated, and can repeat the Check at the end of each of its turns.
A levitated Unit counts as Snared.
Losing concentration (taking damage or being Crowd Controlled) instantly starts slowly dropping the target and breaks the Levitate.
~Levitate~.Upgrade: At Level 8, the amount increases to 5d100.
~Levitate~.Name: ~Levitate~

~North Star~.Effect: You conjure a magical star that always shoots North and deals 4d8 Shock damage to the first Unit hit (against Defense).
~North Star~.Notes:
You can only shoot the star towards North - without an angle.
Ask the DM which way North is (if your character knows that).
This is considered an attack. All attacks are against Defense.
~North Star~.Name: ~North Star~

~Sense Magic~.Effect:
You can tell if there is magic within (Intelligence * 10) meters from you (at least 10 meters).
You can also tell if an object you touch is magical.
If it is a common magic item, you can tell what it does (e.g. Potions, Scrolls, etc).
~Sense Magic~.Name: ~Sense Magic~

~Lag~.Effect:
Declare a 5x5 meter area.
All Units inside it must pass an Intelligence Check or be affected by the following:
- They are Slowed
- They can only make one Attack per round (does not affect Epic Monsters)
- They can't make Reactions
- They can't be invisible
- They can't inflict Crowd Control
Lasts until the start of your next turn.
~Lag~.Notes: Ignores Cover for the Intelligence Check.
~Lag~.Name: ~Lag~

~Unlock~.Effect:
You can attempt to unlock a lock magically.
Using this counts as if you Know How to Pick Locks.
You roll a Dexterity Check for this, and you get a +2 on it.
~Unlock~.Name: ~Unlock~

~Water Walk~.Effect:
Up to 2 willing Units can walk on water as normally.
The effect ends if the Unit takes damage.
~Water Walk~.Name: ~Water Walk~

~Hearth Recall~.Effect:
At any point, you can freely spend 10 minutes in a place to Bind to it.
When you use this Ability, channel for 10 minutes to teleport all allies (and yourself) within 10 meters of you to the bound place.
You can only have 1 bound place at a time.
The range to your bound place must be at most a a number of kilometers equal to your Main Stat * 100.
~Hearth Recall~.Upgrade:
At Level 8, you can have up to 2 bound places.
At Level 10, you can have up to 3 bound places.
~Hearth Recall~.Notes: You can remove the binding of a place at will, from any distance.
~Hearth Recall~.Name: ~Hearth Recall~

~Reverse Gravity~.Effect:
Declare an area with a diameter in meters (in all directions) equal to your Level.
The gravity becomes reversed in that area and all Units instantly fall upwards. Units can make a Dexterity Check to grab onto an object to not be lifted.
Units suffer fall damage if they fall onto a roof.
When the effect ends, all Units fall at half velocity (and take half of the fall damage). The same happens to a Unit if it exits the zone.
Lasts for up to 1 minute. You can cancel this effect at will.
~Reverse Gravity~.Notes: Fall damage is 1d6 for every meter after 2 meters fallen (e.g. 1d6 for 3 meters, 2d6 for 4 meters, etc).
~Reverse Gravity~.Name: ~Reverse Gravity~

~Alarm~.Effect:
You setup an invisible 4x4x4 meter cube.
If an unknown Unit or enemy enters the cube, it alerts you mentally with a bell sound, or whatever sound you choose.
~Alarm~.Name: ~Alarm~

~Control Earth~.Effect:
Choose a 1x1x1 meter cube of dirt, loose stone, sand, etc.
You can do the following things to it.
This turn, and every turn for 10 minutes, you can spend 1 Action to:
- Move it 1 meter in any direction
- Roughly shape it in any form
- Cause it to become difficult terrain.
If a Unit was hit by it or it was removed from below a Unit's feet, it rolls a Dexterity Check (against your Counter Check Grade).
If it fails, it takes 1d8 damage and is knocked prone (or 2d8 damage if the earth was removed from underneath its feet).
The earth can hold up to 20kg of mass on it.
~Control Earth~.Upgrade: You can do this twice per Long Rest at Level 2, 4 times per Long Rest at Level 4 and unlimited times at level 8.
~Control Earth~.Notes:
The cube has 10 Health, 0 Defense and fails all checks for combat purposes. It's immune to Psychic damage and crowd control.
Units might or might not gain Cover from the damage, depending on the circumstance (Cover from the direction the earth is coming from, of course).
~Control Earth~.Name: ~Control Earth~

~Control Wind~.Effect:
You can control gusts of wind in a 6x6x6 area and do the following:
- You can create a gust of Heavy Wind (see notes) that lasts for 1 minute
- You can move a gust of Heavy Wind 3 meters in any direction
- You can create wind that makes Units fall softly
- You can stop it (for 0 Actions)
~Control Wind~.Upgrade:
You can have one gust of wind active at a time.
At Level 3, you can have a number of winds active equal to your Main Stat.
~Control Wind~.Notes:
Moving against Heavy Wind acts as Hard Terrain.
Projectiles fired against the Wind have Cover, and projectiles fired with the Wind gain +1.
Heavy Wind also clears Fog, Smoke, etc in the area.
Multiple Winds don't stack into eachother.
~Control Wind~.Name: ~Control Wind~

~Cure Affliction~.Effect: Touch an ally (or yourself) and cure a normally curable disease or poison from it.
~Cure Affliction~.Upgrade:
At Level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases and poisons.
At level 8, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases and poisons.
~Cure Affliction~.Name: ~Cure Affliction~

~Detect Poison and Disease~.Effect: You know if there is any poison (or poisonous Unit) or disease (or ill person) within 5 meters.
~Detect Poison and Disease~.Name: ~Detect Poison and Disease~

~Flaming Arrows~.Effect: When you declare a ranged weapon attack (before rolling), you can make the attack deal Fire damage (instead of physical).
~Flaming Arrows~.Name: ~Flaming Arrows~

~Mastery~.Effect: You can use Wisdom or Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity for weapon attacks (you still need to be Trained in that weapon to use it properly).
~Mastery~.Notes: Also called Soelluelegh, or however it's spelled.
~Mastery~.Name: ~Mastery~

~Purify Food and Drink~.Effect:
Food you touch becomes clean of microbes and mild poison.
A water containter you touch (up to 2 liters per cast) becomes drinkable, clean and free of microbes and mild poison.
~Purify Food and Drink~.Name: ~Purify Food and Drink~

~Poison Burst~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Might Check.
It takes 1d6 + 2 Poison damage (directly) if it fails, or half of that if it succeeds.
~Poison Burst~.Name: ~Poison Burst~

~Resistance~.Effect:
Touch an ally (or yourself) and choose one Stat.
It has +1d4 in all Combat Checks with that Stat.
You can only have this buff active on one person at a time.
~Resistance~.Name: ~Resistance~

~Barkskin~.Effect:
An ally (or yourself) becomes Snared in the ground for up to 1 minute.
While rooted, that Unit's Defense can't be lower than 6.
~Barkskin~.Notes: You can cancel this effect at any point at will.
~Barkskin~.Name: ~Barkskin~

~Cutting Winds~.Effect:
A Unit in range takes 4d4 direct Slash Damage.
If it weighs 75kg or less, it takes another 2d4 Slash Damage and is pushed up to 3 meters in a chosen direction.
~Cutting Winds~.Notes: This is not considered an attack, but the target can benefit from Cover from it (-2).
~Cutting Winds~.Name: ~Cutting Winds~

~Earth Shield~.Effect:
A Unit you can see becomes surrounded by 3 floating plates of earth.
Whenever the Unit would take damage from an Enemy, it rolls 1d4 and subtracts it from the damage.
~Earth Shield~.Upgrade: At Level 5, this makes 4 floating plates of earth (4 hits).
~Earth Shield~.Notes: Lasts for 24 hours or until you rolled the d4 3 times. Does not stack multiple times with itself.
~Earth Shield~.Name: ~Earth Shield~

~Land Breach~.Effect:
You gather stone, dirt, sand, etc from the surroundings and release it upon an enemy.
Attack a Unit for 3d6 damage Force damage, and then attack all other Units within 1 meter for Damage equal to two of rolled dice (you choose).
~Land Breach~.Notes: All attacks are against Defense. The secondary attack is considered a single separate attack (good to know for certain other Abilities).
~Land Breach~.Name: ~Land Breach~

~Lightning Storm~.Effect:
Declare a cube with a width equal to your Main Stat.
Attack all units inside the area take 5d4 Shock damage now (against Defense).
If a unit carries anything made of metal, this ignores all its Defense.
On your turn (for up to 1 minute), you can spend 1 Action to move the storm up to 3 meters and (and/or) its deal damage again.
Lasts up to 1 minute.
~Lightning Storm~.Upgrade: At Level 5, the range increases to 10 meters to edge.
~Lightning Storm~.Notes: The storm only deals damage the moment you spend 1 Action; if you do spend 1 Action, the storm stays in place and deals no damage.
~Lightning Storm~.Name: ~Lightning Storm~

~Locust Swarm~.Effect:
Choose a Unit.
A swarm of locusts appears and chases it down.
Whenever the Unit moves willingly, it takes 1 True damage for each meter moved.
A Unit can only be affected by one Locust Swarm at a time.
~Locust Swarm~.Note: Locust Swarm can be dispelled like any other effect.
~Locust Swarm~.Name: ~Locust Swarm~

~Paralyzing Sting~.Effect:
Lash out a noxious sting towards a Unit.
It must pass a Might or Dexterity Check (your choice) or be Stunned.
If it succeeds, it takes 2d6 direct Poison Damage instead.
~Paralyzing Sting~.Name: ~Paralyzing Sting~

~Quaking Wave~.Effect:
Send out a 5x1 meter wave forward through the ground.
All Units hit must make a Dexterity Check or take 3d4 + Main Stat Force damage (or half if they succeed).
If they fail and are below 50% Health, they become Dazed. Otherwise, they become Slowed.
~Quaking Wave~.Name: ~Quaking Wave~

~Fruit of the Forest~.Effect: Roll 3d6. You find and/or enchant that many bites of food. Each bite restores 1 Reserve Health to the eater.
~Fruit of the Forest~.Notes: The Reserve Health is evenly spread among the food bites. For example, you might conjure 3d6 berries, each worth 1 Reserve Health. Or you might enchant a loaf of bread, each slice being worth 1 Reserve Health.
~Fruit of the Forest~.Name: ~Fruit of the Forest~

~Scape Grasp~.Effect:
Choose a Unit.
Count how many of these criteria it matches:
- Has armor made of organic material (leather, hide, hemp, etc)
- Is standing directly on vegetation
- It's night and the target is outdoors
It takes damage (directly) and must pass a Wisdom Check or suffer a Crowd Control effect based on its number of matched criteria:
- 1: 1d4 damage, Snared
- 2: 2d4 damage, Snared and Crippled
- 3: 3d4 damage, Stunned
~Scape Grasp~.Name: ~Scape Grasp~

~Thorn Quills~.Effect:
Choose a Unit you can see.
Whever another Unit attacks it (before the roll), it takes 1d4 Pierce damage.
~Thorn Quills~.Name: ~Thorn Quills~

~Venin Shot~.Effect:
Attack a target for 2d8 Poison Damage.
If you (potentially) have cover against that enemy, the attack gains an extra 1d8 Damage and the damage type becomes Necrotic.
~Venin Shot~.Name: ~Venin Shot~

~Wild Heart~.Effect: Up to 2 allies you touch gain Your Main Stat maximum (and current) Health and +1 to all Checks.
~Wild Heart~.Notes: A Unit can only be affected by one Wild Heart buff.
~Wild Heart~.Name: ~Wild Heart~

~Wind Chaser~.Effect: Your next ranged Attack curves around obstacles, ignoring Cover and Hard Cover and deals 1d6 extra Damage of its type.
~Wind Chaser~.Notes: You still need Line of Sight to the target.
~Wind Chaser~.Name: ~Wind Chaser~

~Draw Moisture~.Effect:
Using your hands, you draw in water from all objects in a 1x1x1 meter cube and store magically it in your body.
You can use 1 Action to release all the stored water, without dealing damage.
~Draw Moisture~.Upgrade: You can store a number of 1x1x1 meter cubes of water equal to your Main Stat.
~Draw Moisture~.Notes: Just because you target a 1x1x1 meter cube, it doesn't mean you get a 1x1x1 meter cube of water stored. For ease of use, the GM can say you drew in none, a quarter, a half, 3 quarters or a 1x1x1 meter cube of water from the targeted cube.
~Draw Moisture~.Name: ~Draw Moisture~

~Spider Climb~.Effect:
Your hands and feet can stick to solid, (more or less) flat surfaces, so you can walk on them.
Walking on walls and floors acts as Hard Terrain.
~Spider Climb~.Name: ~Spider Climb~

~Tree Stride~.Effect:
While within 30 meters of trees, you have + 1 Movement Speed.
You can climb trees without rolling Checks, using your normal Movement.
You can use as many meters of your Movement as you like to jump that distance from one tree to another.
~Tree Stride~.Name: ~Tree Stride~

~Conjure Ammo~.Effect: You can conjure up to 10 arrows, bolts or bullets, javelins, throwing knives, etc.
~Conjure Ammo~.Notes: If you have this, you can just say you keep X amount of conjured ammo always ready, to speed the game up and not constantly interrupt the game.
~Conjure Ammo~.Name: ~Conjure Ammo~

~Light~.Effect:
You create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 5 meters radius (10 meters at Level 5).
The bulb levitates and stays where you put it, and you can always move it around with your hands.
You can also simply attach the bulb to any object, or make it levitate and follow a willing Unit.
Lasts until you cancel it or cast Light again, or is purposefully destroyed with an attack.
You choose the color of the light.
Lasts a number of hours equal to your Level, and that's also how many Lights you can have at a time.
~Light~.Notes: The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Alarm~.Effect:
You setup an invisible 4x4x4 meter cube.
If an unknown Unit or enemy enters the cube, it alerts you mentally with a bell sound, or whatever sound you choose.
~Alarm~.Name: ~Alarm~

~Chaining Grasp~.Effect:
Extend a magical chain to a medium (or larger) living or undead Unit and pull yourself to the target instantly.
The target also takes 1d6 True damage (directly).
~Chaining Grasp~.Name: ~Chaining Grasp~

~Dancing Weapon~.Effect:
You conjure a levitating, self-wielding melee weapon.
On your turn, the weapon can make a melee attack that deals 2d8 Force damage (against Defense).
You can also move it up to 3 meters every turn.
~Dancing Weapon~.Notes:
It costs 1 Action and 1 Mana to summon the weapon. Then, the weapon can attack once for free every turn, without costing an Action or Mana.
The weapon has no special effect and can't be targeted by attacks.
The weapon disappears if it moves more than 20 meters away from you.
It does make fleeing enemies Fleeing.
~Dancing Weapon~.Name: ~Dancing Weapon~

~Distort Vision~.Effect:
This incantation distorts the visual space in an area with a diameter equal to your Level.
Make an Intelligence Check for this.
While keeping the distorsion, you must maintain concentration and line of sight.
You lose concentration if you take damage or become crowd controlled.
~Distort Vision~.Upgrade: At Level 5, you can use 1 Action to slowly move the area up to 3 meters.
~Distort Vision~.Notes:
If you have Proficiency in Deception, you can add that to the Check.
In combat, a successful Distort Vision can provide Cover if rolled high enough.
~Distort Vision~.Name: ~Distort Vision~

~Eldritch Steed~.Effect:
You summon a ridable animal which doubles your movement speed on land.
The animal takes either a spectral, demonic or skeletal form.
It follows the normal rules for Riding.
It does not participate in combat.
~Eldritch Steed~.Upgrade: At Level 8 the Steed can fly.
~Eldritch Steed~.Name: ~Eldritch Steed~

~Fairy Fire~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4x4 meter zone.
All Units in that zone make a Dexterity Check with Disadvantage.
If they fail, they become outlined in a colored glow (you choose the color).
Those Units can't benefit from regular Cover, and Hard Cover only provides them with normal Cover.
The Units glow even through walls, but the denser the walls, the less they appear to glow.
~Fairy Fire~.Notes:
A 1-meter thick concrete wall completely blocks the glow.
This is not considered Crowd Control.
~Fairy Fire~.Name: ~Fairy Fire~

~Fake Sound~.Effect:
You create a sound out of thin air.
Roll a Charisma Check and add your Intelligence modifier to it to see how accurate your sound is.
~Fake Sound~.Scaling: At Level 4, this lasts up to 1 minute. At level 8, this lasts up to 1 hour.
~Fake Sound~.Name: ~Fake Sound~

~Fog Cloud~.Effect:
A 5x5x5 meter cube of fog forms that lasts for 1 minute.
All Units inside the fog benefit from Cover (-2), as well as Units outside the fog attacked by someone inside the fog.
You can choose the color of the fog.
The fog spreads around corners.
~Fog Cloud~.Notes: You can cancel this on your turn for 0 Actions.
~Fog Cloud~.Name: ~Fog Cloud~

~Force Wall~.Effect:
You create a 3x3 meter transparent, magical and thin force wall.
Units behind the wall benefit from Hard Cover (-4 to attacks against them through the wall).
~Force Wall~.Name: ~Force Wall~

~Conjure Object~.Effect:
You can conjure an object that is up to 1x1x1 meter in size.
The object is solid and glows faintly.
You can't conjure mechanical objects.
The object disappears after 1 hour (24 hours at Level 8).
~Conjure Object~.Name: ~Conjure Object~

~Mage Hand~.Effect:
Conjure a spectral hand in a place you can see.
You can move the hand as you move your normal hands and instead of spending movement points to move yourself, you can move your hand the same distance.
The hand can't attack and disappears if it goes outside a 12 meters range.
~Mage Hand~.Name: ~Mage Hand~

~Magic Prison~.Effect:
You create a 4x4x4 meter cube.
Choose a Unit inside the cube.
It makes an Intelligence Check with triple disadvantage.
If it fails, it can not exit the cube for 24 hours.
It can make this Check to try to escape every 24 hours.
You can cast this once per day per Mana.
~Magic Prison~.Name: ~Magic Prison~

~Web~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4 meter zone
The zone becomes filled with spider web and counts as Difficult Terrain.
If a Unit exits the zone, it must pass a Dexterity Check or be Snared.
~Web~.Name: ~Web~

~Shadow Clone~.Effect:
You create an illusion of yourself at a target location.
The illusion has 1 Health and 1 Defense and it fails all Checks.
You can control what the illusion does at will.
If the illusion goes more than 10 meters away from you, it disappears and the spell is cancelled.
~Shadow Clone~.Upgrade: At Level 3, the cast range and illusion range become 15 meters and the sound of your voice can come through the illusion's mouth instead of yours. At Level 5 - 25 meters. At Level 7 you can choose to see through the illusion's eyes at any point.
~Shadow Clone~.Notes: You need maintain line of sight to the clone to keep it working.
~Shadow Clone~.Name: ~Shadow Clone~

~Animate Dead~.Effect:
Raise an undead Unit to fight for you from a nearby medium or larger corpse. The corpse is then consumed.
The undead Unit always has Medium size, 10 Maximum Health and 3 Defense.
It has Combat Checks equal to yours, but -2 to all Non-Combat Checks.
It has 4 meters movement speed.
It can use 1 Action to attack and deals 2d4 + 1 damage if it hits (Smash, Slash or Pierce, your choice).
Your undead takes its turn immediately before or after your turn (you choose).
The undead will always try to move to and attack the closest enemy to it (you choose if it's a tie).
You can use Half-Action on your turn to command (one of) your undead to move to a certain location.
~Animate Dead~.Name: ~Animate Dead~

~Banishment Slip~.Effect:
A Medium or smaller Unit becomes Banished to another parallel dimension until the start of your next turn.
While Banished, it can't interact with the normal world and nothing can interact with it.
~Banishment Slip~.Name: ~Banishment Slip~

~Polymorph~.Effect:
Choose an animal from the Pet List or any critter, such as a sheep, deer, etc.
A Unit within 10 meters must pass an Intelligence Check or be transformed into that animal.
At the end of its every turn, it must pass the Check again or remain Polymorphed.
The unit can retains its Health and Defense, but can't do any non-animal actions.
~Polymorph~.Notes:
Cover is applied normally.
A Unit can willingly fail the Check. For enemies, aside from Health and Defense, apply rules for Shapeshift. Allies can apply normal rules for Shapeshift (e.g. gain extra Health from the animal).
If used on an Enemy, this is considered Crowd Control.
~Polymorph~.Name: ~Polymorph~

~Transmogrification~.Effect:
Touch 2 objects of the same type (e.g. 2 helmets, or 2 arrows, or 2 melee 1-handed weapons, etc).
You make one of the look like the other.
The change is permanent until the object breaks.
~Transmogrification~.Notes: Upon close inspection of the shape and colors, this is visibly an illusion.
~Transmogrification~.Name: ~Transmogrification~

~Watcher Eye~.Effect:
You conjure a magical eye that records everything it sees for up to 24 hours.
After 24 hours, the eye stops recording.
You can use your magic to scan what the eye recorded in your mind.
At any point, you can tune into the eye and see what it sees in your mind.
~Watcher Eye~.Upgrade: At Level 6, you can move use your movement to instead move the Eye while you're tuned into it (it can fly).
~Watcher Eye~.Name: ~Watcher Eye~

~Portal~.Effect:
You need a partner who can cast Portal to cast this.
You both cast it at the same time, in different locations.
At the end of the cast time, a portal opens at the locations of the two casters.
Stepping through one of the portals (obviously) teleports the Unit to the other portal.
You can only cast this every 30 days.
~Portal~.Name: ~Portal~

~Guidance~.Effect: When an ally makes a Check, it can use your modifier instead of its own.
~Guidance~.Name: ~Guidance~

~Hollow Touch~.Effect: Make a spell attack that deals 2d10 Necrotic damage (against Defense) and the target is unable to reagain health until the end of its next turn.
~Hollow Touch~.Name: ~Hollow Touch~

~Light~.Effect:
You create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 5 meters radius (10 meters at Level 5).
The bulb levitates and stays where you put it, and you can always move it around with your hands.
You can also simply attach the bulb to any object, or make it levitate and follow a willing Unit.
Lasts until you cancel it or cast Light again, or is purposefully destroyed with an attack.
You choose the color of the light.
Lasts a number of hours equal to your Level, and that's also how many Lights you can have at a time.
~Light~.Notes: The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mastery~.Effect: You can use Wisdom or Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity for weapon attacks (you still need to be Trained in that weapon to use it properly).
~Mastery~.Notes: Also called Soelluelegh, or however it's spelled.
~Mastery~.Name: ~Mastery~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Speak With Animals~.Effect: You can attempt to speak concrete ideas with willing, non-hostile animals.
~Speak With Animals~.Notes: Keep in mind that animals generally have low Intelligence, and they are not expected to 'speak' back to you through language.
~Speak With Animals~.Name: ~Speak With Animals~

~Speak With Plants~.Effect: You can attempt to speak concrete ideas with willing, large plants.
~Speak With Plants~.Notes: Keep in mind that plants generally have low Intelligence, and they are not expected to 'speak' back to you through language.
~Speak With Plants~.Name: ~Speak With Plants~

~Restoration~.Effect: Remove all your party members' Exhaustion from rising after being Fallen, from not sleeping and from magical effects.
~Restoration~.Name: ~Restoration~

~Blessing of Wisdom~.Effect:
An ally you can see (or yourself) restores 1 Mana and has +1 Main Stat for 8 hours.
Then, that Unit becomes immune to Blessing of Wisdom until its next Long Rest.
~Blessing of Wisdom~.Notes:
Mana restored can't exceed their maximum Mana.
A Unit can't have multiple Blessings of Wisdom on it.
~Blessing of Wisdom~.Name: ~Blessing of Wisdom~

~Expelling Bolt~.Effect: Make an attack on a Unit that deals 1d6 + Your Main Stat + Target's current Movement Speed damage as Force damage (against Defense).
~Expelling Bolt~.Notes: Against Epic monsters, the Maximum Speed is calculated as it's (Speed) * (Epic Grade). E.g. if it's an Ogre with Movement Speed of 3 and has an Epic Grade of 2 (meaning it takes 2 turns), its Maximum Movement Speed is 2 * 3 = 6.
~Expelling Bolt~.Name: ~Expelling Bolt~

~Invigorate~.Effect:
Heal a target for 1d4 + 2 Health.
If after this the target is at full Health, repeat this on another target.
~Invigorate~.Notes: Yes, this can chain again and again.
~Invigorate~.Name: ~Invigorate~

~Mind Blast~.Effect:
A Unit must pass a Wisdom Check or take 3d6 Psychic damage and become Crippled or Silenced (your choice).
It takes half damage if it passes.
After you cast Mind Blast on a Unit, it becomes completely immune to Mind Blast for 1 day.
~Mind Blast~.Name: ~Mind Blast~

~Confusion~.Effect:
Choose 2 Units you can see.
Each must pass a Wisdom Check or take 2d4 Psychic damage (or half if it succeeds).
For each that fails, also roll 1d4 and the Unit must do one of the 4 options below on its next turn, depending on the number rolled on the d4:
1. Moves in a random direction with all of its movement (chosen by the DM) and is Maimed
2. Forgets to move and is Dazed
3. Forgets to move and is Blinded
4. Falls Prone and tries to make a ranged attack
~Confusion~.Notes:
A Dazed NPC is Slowed and all its offensive actions have Cover.
A Maimed NPC makes 1 less attack per turn.
If you roll 4 and the Unit can't make a ranged attack, it does not take any action.
Cover is applied normally.
~Confusion~.Name: ~Confusion~

~Willpower Aura~.Effect: For 8 hours, all allies around you (and you) can spend 0.5 Actions to gain Shielding equal to your Main Stat until their (or your) next turn..
~Willpower Aura~.Upgrade:
At Level 3, you all gain +2 to Wisdom Checks as well.
At Level 6, you all gain 50% Resistance to Psychic and True damage as well for 8 hours when you cast this.
~Willpower Aura~.Name: ~Willpower Aura~

~Charming Word~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Wisdom Check.
If it fails, all your Charisma checks for/against it have +2.
Lasts until the Unit can't see or hear you anymore.
~Charming Word~.Notes: The target can't tell it was affected unless it knows about this type of magic. Cover is applied normally.
~Charming Word~.Name: ~Charming Word~

~Encode Thoughts~.Effect:
You pull a String of Memory or Thoughts (can be visual, auditive, sensory and olphactive) from your own memory.
This String can be up to 1 minute in length.
It is visible to the eye as an arcane ribbon-like energy.
You can transport this String like you would carry a normal 10x10x10 decimeter object.
To view the String, a person can willingly absorb it through the mouth, eyes, nose, etc (corresponding to the type of memories) and visualize the String.
After that, the String disappears.
Encoding another String makes the previous String disappear.
~Encode Thoughts~.Name: ~Encode Thoughts~

~Influence Beast~.Effect:
A non-legendary beast that can see you makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, you can change the beast's mood (make it hungry, afraid, nervous, etc).
~Influence Beast~.Name: ~Influence Beast~

~Locate Unit~.Effect:
Name or describe a Unit that is familiar to you.
You know the direction towards that Unit and the direction of its movement.
~Locate Unit~.Upgrade:
At Level 6, the range of this Spell becomes 500.
At Level 8, the range is infinite.
~Locate Unit~.Notes: You can choose to locate a Unit of a certain type (e.g. a zombie, a human, an elephant) or a specific Unit, as long as you know know what it looks like.
~Locate Unit~.Name: ~Locate Unit~

~Translation~.Effect: You can understand any spoken or written language that's either Common (Dwarvish, Elvish) or Wild (spoken by "wild", tribal socities, such as Orcish, Goblan, Sylvan, etc).
~Translation~.Name: ~Translation~

~Scrying~.Effect:
You spend 10 minutes learning information about an area from a point within 100km.
You get a vision (a single snapshot) of whatever is in the line of sight from that point chosen, in any direction.
Until your next Long rest, your party ignores Hard Terrain in the scryed area.
~Scrying~.Notes:
The Game Master decides what visions you get - you might see that zone from the past, or see only the landscape without the people. An area might also be blocked by anti-scrying magic.
You only get one picture, one snapshot, one screenshot that is not moving.
~Scrying~.Name: ~Scrying~

~Watcher Eye~.Effect:
You conjure a magical eye that records everything it sees for up to 24 hours.
After 24 hours, the eye stops recording.
You can use your magic to scan what the eye recorded in your mind.
At any point, you can tune into the eye and see what it sees in your mind.
~Watcher Eye~.Upgrade: At Level 6, you can move use your movement to instead move the Eye while you're tuned into it (it can fly).
~Watcher Eye~.Name: ~Watcher Eye~

~Water Breathing~.Effect: Up to 2 allies you can see (can include yourself) gain the ability to also breathe under water
~Water Breathing~.Upgrade: Alternatively, if this Ability is on Cooldown, you can spend 1 Mana to cast it regardless.
~Water Breathing~.Name: ~Water Breathing~

~Wild Steed~.Effect:
You call upon a ridable land animal native to the zone you are in.
You and up to 1 more party member can ride this animal.
It follows the normal rules for Riding.
It does not participate in combat.
~Wild Steed~.Upgrade: At Level 8, this can be a flying animal.
~Wild Steed~.Name: ~Wild Steed~

~Decaying Blight~.Effect:
Channel to spawn a blight that spreads 1 meter in all direction for each 1 Action channeled.
The blight kills small plants, insects and rots wood and rusts metal. It also makes fertile soil infertile, turns textile and paper materials into dust and decays food and poisons water.
You can channel a number of times (Actions) equal to your Level.
~Decaying Blight~.Upgrade: At Level 4, you can choose to ommit some of the effects of this blight.
~Decaying Blight~.Notes:
This Ability is not meant for combat.
Be creative with how you use this little spell!
~Decaying Blight~.Name: ~Decaying Blight~

~Disenchantment~.Duration: 8 hours (24 hours at level 4, 1 week at level 8)
~Disenchantment~.Effect:
A humanoid makes a Wisdom Check.
If it fails, it becomes afflicted with a minor non-combat curse, such as:
- The target can't properly tie knots, sew, use keys or pick locks, etc
- The target appears less attractive (its Charisma Skill checks have -3)
- Gains runny nose, eyes and sweats more
- Stumbles randomly
~Disenchantment~.Name: ~Disenchantment~

~Eldritch Blast~.Effect:
Make an attack for 2d6 + Main Stat Force damage (against Defense).
If you roll maximum on at least one die, deal another 1d6 damage.
~Eldritch Blast~.Name: ~Eldritch Blast~

~Hollow Touch~.Effect: Make a spell attack that deals 2d10 Necrotic damage (against Defense) and the target is unable to reagain health until the end of its next turn.
~Hollow Touch~.Name: ~Hollow Touch~

~Thaumaturgy~.Effect:
You create one of the following magical effects:
- Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.
- You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
- You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
- You cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
- You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.
~Thaumaturgy~.Upgrade: At Level 5 you can cast this for Half-Action, and at Level 9, for 0 Actions.
~Thaumaturgy~.Name: ~Thaumaturgy~

~Curse of Pain~.Effect:
Declare a target.
Whenever it makes an attack, it takes 4 Psychic damage (directly).
~Curse of Pain~.Name: ~Curse of Pain~

~Curse of Weakness~.Effect:
A target makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, whenever it makes an attack roll or Check, it rolls 1d4 and subtracts it from the result.
~Curse of Weakness~.Notes: Cover is applied normally to the Charisma Check.
~Curse of Weakness~.Name: ~Curse of Weakness~

~Deathfire Bolt~.Effect:
Make a spell attack (against Defense) that deals 1d10 + 1d8 + 1d6 + Main Stat damage, Fire or Necrotic (you choose).
If the target has more than 4 Defense, deals 2 more damage for each point of Defense over 4.
~Deathfire Bolt~.Name: ~Deathfire Bolt~

~Animate Dead~.Effect:
Raise an undead Unit to fight for you from a nearby medium or larger corpse. The corpse is then consumed.
The undead Unit always has Medium size, 10 Maximum Health and 3 Defense.
It has Combat Checks equal to yours, but -2 to all Non-Combat Checks.
It has 4 meters movement speed.
It can use 1 Action to attack and deals 2d4 + 1 damage if it hits (Smash, Slash or Pierce, your choice).
Your undead takes its turn immediately before or after your turn (you choose).
The undead will always try to move to and attack the closest enemy to it (you choose if it's a tie).
You can use Half-Action on your turn to command (one of) your undead to move to a certain location.
~Animate Dead~.Name: ~Animate Dead~

~Spare the Dying~.Effect:
Touch a Unit that died at most 10 minutes ago or an unconscious Unit.
If the Unit is dead, and if the Unit's body is fairly intact, the dead Unit comes back to life, stabilized and unconscious.
If the Unit is unconscious, the Unit wakes up and is healed for 1 Health.
~Spare the Dying~.Name: ~Spare the Dying~

~Cure Affliction~.Effect: Touch an ally (or yourself) and cure a normally curable disease or poison from it.
~Cure Affliction~.Upgrade:
At Level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases and poisons.
At level 8, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases and poisons.
~Cure Affliction~.Name: ~Cure Affliction~

~Detect Poison and Disease~.Effect: You know if there is any poison (or poisonous Unit) or disease (or ill person) within 5 meters.
~Detect Poison and Disease~.Name: ~Detect Poison and Disease~

~Flameblade~.Effect: You can freely change the damage of your melee weapon attacks to Fire damage.
~Flameblade~.Name: ~Flameblade~

~Light~.Effect:
You create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 5 meters radius (10 meters at Level 5).
The bulb levitates and stays where you put it, and you can always move it around with your hands.
You can also simply attach the bulb to any object, or make it levitate and follow a willing Unit.
Lasts until you cancel it or cast Light again, or is purposefully destroyed with an attack.
You choose the color of the light.
Lasts a number of hours equal to your Level, and that's also how many Lights you can have at a time.
~Light~.Notes: The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Purify Food and Drink~.Effect:
Food you touch becomes clean of microbes and mild poison.
A water containter you touch (up to 2 liters per cast) becomes drinkable, clean and free of microbes and mild poison.
~Purify Food and Drink~.Name: ~Purify Food and Drink~

~Saving Throw (Faith)~.Effect: Instantly pull an ally to your nearest empty space.
~Saving Throw (Faith)~.Notes:
The ally goes flying, and does not trigger opportunity attacks.
You need line of sight to the targets. The allies fly to you ignoring obstacles and ground traps (goes around obstacles), unless the ally needs to swerve more than 2 meters in any direction.
~Saving Throw (Faith)~.Name: ~Saving Throw (Faith)~

~Blinding Smite~.Effect:
After you make a melee attack that did damage, all enemies within 3 meters of the target make a Dexterity Check.
If they fail, they are Blinded for 1 turn.
~Blinding Smite~.Notes: Cover is applied normally for the Dexterity Check.
~Blinding Smite~.Name: ~Blinding Smite~

~Cleansing Flames~.Effect: Deal 1d4 + 2 Fire damage (directly) and remove all buffs and debuffs from the target.
~Cleansing Flames~.Name: ~Cleansing Flames~

~Cleansing Smite~.Effect: After you land a melee attack that did damage, deal 1d6 True damage (directly) to the target and heal yourself for 1d10.
~Cleansing Smite~.Name: ~Cleansing Smite~

~Cure Wounds~.Effect: Touch an ally (or yourself) and heal it for 2d4 + Main Stat.
~Cure Wounds~.Name: ~Cure Wounds~

~Guiding Bolt~.Effect:
Attack a target for 2d8 + Main Stat True damage.
The next time someone would cast a spell that affects that Unit, the caster can reroll any of the spell's dice, at most one reroll for each die.
~Guiding Bolt~.Notes: This affects AoE effects and healing abilities too. For any reason, you can choose not to deal damage with this spell.
~Guiding Bolt~.Name: ~Guiding Bolt~

~Hand of Freedom~.Effect: Instantly remove all Crowd Control from another ally you can see.
~Hand of Freedom~.Upgrade:
At Level 3, also removes all non-magical debuffs and poisons.
At Level 6, also removes all curses and normal negative magical effects.
~Hand of Freedom~.Name: ~Hand of Freedom~

~Radiant Smite~.Effect: After you make a melee attack that did damage, deal 1d10 True damage (directly) to the target and all enemies within 6 meters of target.
~Radiant Smite~.Name: ~Radiant Smite~

~Radiance~.Effect: For 1 minute, at the end of your turn, all Units within 1 meter of you take 1d4 True damage.
~Radiance~.Name: ~Radiance~

~Restful Soothing~.Effect: Restore up to 3d6 Health spread out as you like among your party members.
~Restful Soothing~.Note: You must be staying in place to channel this. You can't heal yourself with this.
~Restful Soothing~.Name: ~Restful Soothing~

~Searing Smite~.Effect: Add 3d4 Fire damage to a weapon Attack (after you rolled the attack). The target takes another 1d4 Fire damage at the start of each of next turns for 1 minute.
~Searing Smite~.Name: ~Searing Smite~

~Turn Undead~.Effect:
All enemy Undead you can see within 5 meters make a Wisdom Check.
If any fails, it is Feared.
~Turn Undead~.Name: ~Turn Undead~

~Fearing Ward~.Effect:
Choose an ally (or yourself) you can see. Put a ward on them until the start of your next turn.
When an enemy wants to make an attack on them, the enemy must pass a Wisdom Check or be Feared by that ally and take 4d4 Necrotic damage (or half if it succeeds).
The ally is also immune to being Feared, Charmed and Silenced in this time.
~Fearing Ward~.Name: ~Fearing Ward~

~Rise~.Effect:
Heal a Fallen Unit to 20% of it total Health.
It does not suffer of Exhaustion from rising after being Fallen.
~Rise~.Name: ~Rise~

~Spare the Dying~.Effect:
Touch a Unit that died at most 2 hours ago or an unconscious Unit.
If the Unit is dead, and if the Unit's body is fairly intact, the dead Unit comes back to life, stabilized and unconscious.
If the Unit is unconscious, the Unit wakes up and is healed for 1 Health.
~Spare the Dying~.Name: ~Spare the Dying~

~Wraithwalk~.Effect:
You become spectral for 10 seconds (until the start of your next turn).
While spectral, you can move through walls, objects and Units, but not through floors and ceilings.
If the effect doesn't end in an empty space, you are instantly thrown to the nearest empty space and you take 3d4 Force damage (directly).
~Wraithwalk~.Name: ~Wraithwalk~
